rules.name: Lightning Assault
rules.lore: Thousands of years of collated strategic data and hard-won combat experience have provided the Deathwatch with the ultimate battlefield tactics to combat almost any foe.
rules.text: Your +Adeptus Astartes+ units may Charge after making an Advance or Fall Back movement.

strategems.name: Shock Assault
strategems.when: Your unit's Activation, before it has made a Charge
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Activation, your unit can re-roll its Charge roll, and its equipped melee weapons have +[Lance]+.

strategems.name: Ride Hard, Ride Fast
strategems.when: Your opponent's Activation, after the Activated unit has declared Shoot targets.
strategems.target: The friendly +Adeptus Astartes+ +Mounted+ or +Adeptus Astartes+ +Fly+ +Vehicle+ unit being attacked.
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Battle Round, attacks made against the selected unit have -1 to the Hit roll and -1 to the Wound roll.

spells.name: Umbral Form
spells.effect: Gain an Invulnerable Save trait of 4+ until the end of the Battle Round.

spells.name: Enveloping Darkness
spells.effect: Select a visible enemy unit within 18". Until the end of the Battle Round, that unit cannot use the Fire Overwatch stratgem, and it has -1 to all Hit rolls.

spells.name: Shadowstep
spells.effect: Select a friendly +Raven Guard+ +Character+ unit within 18". Move it anywhere on the battlefield at least 9" away from enemy models.

upgrades.name: Student of the Codex
upgrades.text: At the start of the battle, gain 1 CP.

upgrades.name: Keep to the Shadows
upgrades.text: Your +Warlord+ gains the +Stealth+, +Lone Operative+, and +Secure Objectives+ rules. If your +Warlord+ already had any of these rules, gain 1 CP at the start of the battle for each duplicated rule.
